Kanshudo_mnemonic: the woman (女) you reach (至) is your niece
humanum_full_description_en:
From " female " to " to ", the original meaning refers to the child of a woman's brother, and later refers to the children of both brothers and sisters. "Shuowen": "Brother's daughter. From female to voice." It can be seen that " Suowen " believes that the original meaning of " naughty " includes only the daughter of the elder brother, not the daughter of the younger brother. Duan Yucai changed the original meaning of "姪" to "a woman called the child of a brother" according to "Er Ya", and believed that the use of "姪" to mean "the child of a brother and a brother" was a later extended meaning, not the original meaning. Duan Yucai's note: "Women are the sons of brothers. Each of these works is "Brother's Daughter", which is endless. Today, it is based on "Er Ya". "Shi Qin" says: "Women are the sons of brothers and sisters." "Mourning Apparel" Grand Merit Chapter says: "Women who are suitable for human beings are reported to all Kundi, niece, husband and wife." The legend says: What is the maiden? What is my aunt, I am the maiden." It is said that the husband and the wife are the same. Mausoleum is not exclusively a female. The "Gongyang Biography" says: "The two countries go to a concubine, as a concubine." It is also a woman. The Zuo Zhuan says: "A concubine of concubine." It is also a husband. No. It is said that those who are still sons are different from men. Nowadays, secular men say that the son of a brother is a niece, which is a bad name. From a woman to a woman, it is said that it is a sister of the uncle. Xu misunderstands the use of "Gongyang" "Brothers and daughters are also training, no."

" Music " is used as the woman's surname in the oracle bone inscriptions , such as "Complete Collection" 21066: "Music", which means a woman with the surname of her.
humanum_short_description_en: From " female " to " to ", the original meaning refers to the child of a woman's brother, and later refers to the children of both brothers and sisters.
humanum_full_description:
从「女」，「至」聲，本義指女子稱兄弟的子女，後泛指男女雙方兄弟的子女。《說文》：「兄之女也。从女，至聲。」可見《說文》認為「姪」之本義只包括兄長之女，不包括幼弟之女。段玉裁則據《爾雅》改「姪」之本義為「女子稱兄弟的子女」，並認為「姪」表示「男女雙方兄弟的子女」這種用法為後來的引申義，並非本義。段玉裁注：「女子謂兄弟之子也。各本作『兄之女也』，不完，今依《爾雅》正。《釋親》曰：『女子謂晜弟之子爲姪。』《喪服》大功章曰：『女子子適人者，爲衆昆弟，姪丈夫婦人報。』傳曰：姪者，何也？謂吾姑者吾謂之姪。』經言丈夫婦人同謂之姪，則非專謂女也。《公羊傳》曰：『二國往媵，以姪娣從。』謂婦人也。《左傳》曰：『姪其從姑。』謂丈夫也。不謂之猶子者，女外成别於男也。今世俗男子謂兄弟之子爲姪，是名之不正也。从女，此从女者，謂系乎姑之偁也。許誤會用《公羊》兄之女也爲訓，非是。」

　　「姪」在甲骨文中作女子姓氏，如《合集》21066：「婦姪」，表示姓姪的婦人。
humanum_short_description: 从「女」，「至」聲，本義指女子稱兄弟的子女，後泛指男女雙方兄弟的子女。

Kanshudo mnemonic:the woman (女) you reach (至) is your niece

从「 女 」，「 至 」聲，本義指女子稱兄弟的子女，後泛指男女雙方兄弟的子女。《說文》：「兄之女也。从女，至聲。」可見《說文》認為「 姪 」之本義只包括兄長之女，不包括幼弟之女。段玉裁則據《爾雅》改「 姪 」之本義為「女子稱兄弟的子女」，並認為「 姪 」表示「男女雙方兄弟的子女」這種用法為後來的引申義，並非本義。段玉裁注：「女子謂兄弟之子也。各本作『兄之女也』，不完，今依《爾雅》正。《釋親》曰：『女子謂晜弟之子爲姪。』《喪服》大功章曰：『女子子適人者，爲衆昆弟，姪丈夫婦人報。』傳曰：姪者，何也？謂吾姑者吾謂之姪。』經言丈夫婦人同謂之姪，則非專謂女也。《公羊傳》曰：『二國往媵，以姪娣從。』謂婦人也。《左傳》曰：『姪其從姑。』謂丈夫也。不謂之猶子者，女外成别於男也。今世俗男子謂兄弟之子爲姪，是名之不正也。从女，此从女者，謂系乎姑之偁也。許誤會用《公羊》兄之女也爲訓，非是。」 「 姪 」在甲骨文中作女子姓氏，如《合集》21066：「婦姪」，表示姓姪的婦人。

姪字的基本解释

姪
zhí
同“侄”。

姪字的汉语字典释义

[①]［zhí］
［《廣韻》直一切，入質，澄。］
［《廣韻》徒結切，入屑，定。］
亦作“妷1”。同“侄1”。
(1)古时女子称兄弟的子女为侄。
(2)晋以后男子始称兄弟之子为侄。
(3)泛称同辈男性亲友的子女。如某某贤侄。亦用以对父辈尊长自称侄。如世侄、姻侄等。

姪字的康熙字典解释

【丑集下】【女字部】　姪； 康熙笔画：9； 页码：页260第19
【唐韻】【集韻】【韻會】徒結切【正韻】杜列切，?音咥。兄弟之女也。古之貴者嫁女，必以姪娣從。【釋名】姑謂兄弟之女曰姪。姪，迭也。更迭進御也。【春秋傳】姪其從姑。　又兄弟之子。【聞見錄】宋眞宗過洛，幸呂蒙正第，問諸子孰可用。對曰：臣諸子皆豚犬，有姪夷?，宰相才也。　又妻兄弟之子妻，稱之亦曰姪。【唐書·狄仁傑傳】仁傑諫武后曰：姑姪與母子，孰親。　又【廣韻】直一切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】直質切，?音秩。義同。　又與耊通。【漢郭究?】耆姪士女。　又【山海經】鳧麗山有獸如狐，九尾九首，虎爪，名曰聾姪是食人。　或作妷。俗作侄，非。

姪字的源字形

字源演变：

甲骨文金文小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
姪字的起名意思

暂无。

Nephew
Basic explanation of words
Nephew
zhí
Same as "nephew".
Nephew
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［zhí］
["Guangyun" straightens everything, enters the quality, and clarifies. ]
["Guangyun" only knots, cuts, and sets. ]
Also known as "妷1". Same as "nephew 1".
(1) In ancient times, a woman called her brother's children a nephew.
(2) After the Jin Dynasty, men began to call their brother's son a nephew.
(3) Generally referred to as children of male relatives and friends of the same generation. Such as XX virtuous nephew. It is also used to call himself a nephew to the elders of the parents. Such as nephews, nephews in-laws, etc.
Nephew

[Chou Ji 2] [Female Character Department] 　姪; Kangxi Strokes: 9; Page Number: Page 260 Page 19
[Tang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] Knot cut [Positive rhyme] Du Lieqie, sound baa. Brother's daughter also. The nobles of ancient times marry a daughter, they must follow as a concubine. [Release name] The aunt is the daughter of a brother called a niece. My sister, Die Ye. Change into the Royal also. [Chun Qiu Biography] The sister-in-law.　The son of another brother. [Wearings and Records] Song Suizong passed Luo, but fortunately, Lu Meng was the first to ask who is available. He said to him: The ministers are all dolphins, and there are men and barbarians, and only the prime minister.　The wife of the wife and the son of a brother, and he is also called a niece. [Tang Shu·Di Renjie Biography] Renjie admonished Empress Wu and said: which one is the aunt and the mother and son.　[Guangyun] Straighten everything [Jiyun] [Rhyme] [Zhengyun] Straight quality cut, the sound rank. The same meaning.　Connect with Qi again. [Study of Han Guo?] The old lady.　[Shan Hai Jing] There are beasts like foxes in Fuli Mountain, nine tails and nine heads, tiger claws, and the deaf woman is a cannibal.　Or Zuoyou. Vulgar nephew, non.
